author: markt
msg: Add the type of scan to the JarScanner API
This is preparation for changing how jarsToSkip are handled.

author: markt
msg: Shared loader should be treated as a source of application JARs
Commons and Server loaders should be treated as a source of container

author: markt
msg: Add a comment on TLD JARs since no distinction is made between
TLDs provided by an application and by the container.

author: markt
msg: Enable client of JarScanner to determine if JAR is part of a web
application or provided by the container.

author: markt
msg: Already skipped WEB-INF/lib so no need to skip those JARs again
